testimonials.text: Meera is a good example for those who have interest to work in the industry as she set the standard high for her work and really all out. She is dedicated and good personality..

spent a year working with Meera in LUCT and loved every second of it since Meera is a very kind and passionate person as well as a professional individual she is. I also liked the fact that she was one the students' most favorite lecturers as well. She is so much into reading and updating herself to make sure the quality of the task she is doing is always on top.
